/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. A car is parked on the right side of the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the colorful buildings. On the left side of the street, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
